Text:
Welcome to WILD: North East North America. The goal of the game is to build ecosystems from an environment all the way up to an apex predator, filling each number by placing a card to fill that role.

To begin, touch and drag the Forests and Woodlands card near the top of the screen to place it.

Double tap a card to see it in greater detail and double tap again to zoom back out.

Food chains start with the green plant cards. The icons on the top right of the card indicate what environments the plant can be played on. Not all plants can play on every environment.

To continue, tap and drag the green American Ginseng card onto the Forests and Woodlands card to start a new food chain. Each environment can support up to 2 different food chains.
